title: Audit standard/ workflow agents for holistic coherence
description: Review all agents in standard/.claude/agents/ (orchestrator.md, spec-agent.md, plan-agent.md, implement-agent.md, verify-agent.md) to ensure: (1) file path references are correct and consistent, (2) terminology aligns across all agents, (3) handoff protocols between agents are clear, (4) alignment with Spec->Plan->Execute->Verify workflow documented in CLAUDE.md.
notes: This audit may reveal additional tasks needed. Check for: dead links, outdated references, inconsistent phase names, unclear handoff triggers. Focus on coherence as a system, not just individual correctness.

assumptions.description: Five agents cover the complete workflow
Agents use consistent terminology for workflow phases
assumptions.validation_method: Extract and compare terminology across files
